Comments
November 2, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 0-1 Super-efficient Star Sapphire brings some key abilities for a tiny investment: Side-step, flier, TK and Barrier. Fantastic value but very low on flavor. I still consider her when my DC villain teams need a cheap TK piece - but if I can splurge a little, the JLU SR for 5 points more brings a bit more fun.
May 4, 2021
Organous
Lt. Kyle has officially been replaced. He was pretty good for his Sidestep + Telekinesis, and theoretically could even still have an edge with Willpower. Star Sapphire also brings Flight, Barrier, and much friendlier keywords. I will likely run this on almost every Cosmic team I ever make.
